MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH27 postcode area of Kirknewton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.59pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to broken overhead line equipment near to Overton Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:06 PM on Friday, 26 March 2021.
